title: Mini-Ep 217: Soothing, Sexy, Ships
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 217: Soothing, Sexy, Ships
itunes:subtitle: Kate wonders what to do with the bottom half of her face as she adjusts to removing her mask in public, and Doree receives a million helpful suggestions on how to fly across the country with a two-year-old. Then, listeners weigh in about solo backpacki...
description:
Kate wonders what to do with the bottom half of her face as she adjusts to removing her mask in public, and Doree receives a million helpful suggestions on how to fly across the country with a two-year-old. Then, listeners weigh in about solo backpacking, adjusting to the US reopening, and normalizing later-in-life firsts. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter at forever35podcast.com/newsletter
